price: 28. Mpe totindaki yo sé тропа bopesi sango ya malamu mpe тропа kokebisa molongo mobimba, kasi ebele ya bato bazali koyeba te.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnāka illā kāffatan lilnnāsi bashīran wanadhīran walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
